languages.text: "Бесполезно. Я получил информацию о том, что мон-кай могут привести сюда свои убогие игрушки. Я позаботился, чтобы состав токсина учитывал и их особенности".
"A futile effort. I was informed that the mon-keigh might bring some of their primitive toys here with them, so I made sure that the toxin accounted for their particular quirks."
languages.original_text: "Бесполезно. Я получил информацию о том, что мон-кай могут привести сюда свои убогие игрушки. Я позаботился, чтобы состав токсина учитывал и их особенности".

traits.locale_text: "A futile effort. I was informed that the mon-keigh might bring some of their primitive toys here with them. I made sure that the toxin accounted for their particular quirks."
"A futile effort. I was informed that the mon-keigh might bring some of their primitive toys here with them. I made sure that the toxin accounted for their particular quirks."
"A futile effort. I was informed that the mon-keigh might bring some of their primitive toys here with them, so I made sure that the toxin accounted for their particular quirks."
"A futile effort. I was informed that the mon-keigh might bring some of their primitive toys here with them, so I made sure that the toxin accounted for their particular quirks."
"A futile effort. I was informed that the mon-keigh might bring some of their primitive toys here with them, so I made sure that the toxin accounted for their particular quirks."
"A futile effort. I was informed that the mon-keigh might bring some of their primitive toys here with them, so I made sure that the toxin accounted for their particular quirks."

languages.text: “别再白费心机了。有人告诉我，说有只猴子可能会把某些原始的玩具一起带来，于是我亲自做了检查，确保这种毒素对那些有趣的玩具也同样有效。”
languages.original_text: "A futile effort. I was informed that the mon-keigh might bring some of their primitive toys here with them, so I made sure that the toxin accounted for their particular quirks."

traits.locale_text: “别再白费心机了。有人告诉我，说有只猴子可能会把某些原始的玩具一起带来，于是我亲自做了检查，确保这种毒素对那些有趣的玩具也同样有效。”

languages.text: «Un esfuerzo vano. Había sido informado de que los mon-keigh podríais traer algunos juguetitos primitivos, así que me aseguré de que la toxina fuera adecuada para sus particularidades».
languages.original_text: "A futile effort. I was informed that the mon-keigh might bring some of their primitive toys here with them, so I made sure that the toxin accounted for their particular quirks."

traits.locale_text: «Un esfuerzo vano. Había sido informado de que los mon-keigh podríais traer algunos juguetitos primitivos, así que me aseguré de que la toxina fuera adecuada para sus particularidades».

languages.text: « Inutile. On m'a indiqué que les mon-keigh étaient susceptibles d'apporter avec eux des jouets primitifs, je me suis donc assuré d'utiliser une toxine adaptée à leurs particularités. »
languages.original_text: "A futile effort. I was informed that the mon-keigh might bring some of their primitive toys here with them, so I made sure that the toxin accounted for their particular quirks."

traits.locale_text: « Inutile. On m'a indiqué que les mon-keigh étaient susceptibles d'apporter avec eux des jouets primitifs, je me suis donc assuré d'utiliser une toxine adaptée à leurs particularités. »

languages.text: 「無駄な努力だ。モン＝ケイが自分たちの原始的なおもちゃをいくつか持ち込むかもしれないと聞いていたから、毒は彼らの特有の特徴にも対応できるようにしておいた」
languages.original_text: "A futile effort. I was informed that the mon-keigh might bring some of their primitive toys here with them, so I made sure that the toxin accounted for their particular quirks."

traits.locale_text: 「無駄な努力だ。モン＝ケイが自分たちの原始的なおもちゃをいくつか持ち込むかもしれないと聞いていたから、毒は彼らの特有の特徴にも対応できるようにしておいた」

languages.text: "Nafile bir çaba. Mon-keighlerin ilkel oyuncaklarından bazılarını buraya getirebilecekleri bilgisi bana verilmişti, bu yüzden toksinin onların özel tuhaflıklarını içerdiğinden emin oldum."
languages.original_text: "A futile effort. I was informed that the mon-keigh might bring some of their primitive toys here with them, so I made sure that the toxin accounted for their particular quirks."

traits.locale_text: "Nafile bir çaba. Mon-keighlerin ilkel oyuncaklarından bazılarını buraya getirebilecekleri bilgisi bana verilmişti, bu yüzden toksinin onların özel tuhaflıklarını içerdiğinden emin oldum."

languages.text: "Ein sinnloser Versuch. Mir wurde gesagt, die Chem-Pan-Sey könnten einige ihrer primitiven Spielzeuge mitbringen, also habe ich dafür gesorgt, dass das Toxin sich um ihre speziellen Eigenarten kümmert."
languages.original_text: "A futile effort. I was informed that the mon-keigh might bring some of their primitive toys here with them, so I made sure that the toxin accounted for their particular quirks."

traits.locale_text: "Ein sinnloser Versuch. Mir wurde gesagt, die Chem-Pan-Sey könnten einige ihrer primitiven Spielzeuge mitbringen, also habe ich dafür gesorgt, dass das Toxin sich um ihre speziellen Eigenarten kümmert."
